thread.title: Husna Sameera sets world carrom record
thread.title_full: Husna Sameera sets world carrom record

author: Deccan
title: Husna Sameera sets world carrom record
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 18, 2015, 01.26 am Husna Sameera Hyderabad : Telangana girl Husna Sameera on Saturday broke her own world record by playing carrom continuously for 20 hours, 20 minutes and 20 seconds. Her earlier record stood at 18 hours, 18 minutes and 18 seconds. Over 20 players from Telangana and Andhra Pradesh played against Husna in her endeavour to break her own world record. Husna started her bid at 6 pm on Friday and wrapped things up at 20 seconds past 4 pm on Saturday. sports carrom Husna Sameera Also Read ‘I am proud!’: Sania Mirza ‘They thought I was a thief’ Defending champion Saina Nehwal seeded second in Australian Open Atletico Madrid holds off Barcelona to win La Liga
